level.heading: Protection of emergency 2-way radio communications - Penalties.
level.text: Any person who violates any provision of §§ 5-1306 to 5-1309, upon conviction, shall be subject to a fine of not more than $500 or imprisonment of not more than 90 days, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-105
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-105, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 5-1306.
